sentences.sContent: Wright grew frustrated with American provincialism.
sentences.sCn: 赖特对美国的地方偏狭观念愈发感到沮丧。

synos.tran: 方言；地方风格；乡下习气

words.tran: 粗野的人；乡下人；外地人

trans.tranOther: Provincialism is the holding of old-fashioned attitudes and opinions, which some people think is typical of people in areas away from the capital city or any large city of a country
